txt.en: In your absence, new threats have come to The Misty Mountains. Authi, an explorer in Glóin's Camp, seeks assistance if he is ever to finish exploring the peaks and caverns of the Misty Mountains.
Authi can be found in Glóin's Camp.\n\nYou should speak with Authi.
Roving Threats of The Misty Mountains
Authi requires assistance as The Misty Mountains are once again under threat.

'Greetings, I am Authi! You have come at a most fortuitous time.\n\n'I am an explorer by trade, always looking for an interesting artifact or lost treasure. Unlike many dwarves I am happy exploring the highest peak as I am happy exploring the deepest depth. You look like you could assist me. My exploration of the Misty Mountains has been hindered by some creatures on the slopes. Will you help me out?'
Authi can be found in Glóin's Camp.\n\nYou should speak with Authi.
